short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT File Number: W8486-239050/A Tier: 1 (<$2M) This requirement is for Department of National Defence for the services of One (1) Senior Technician
description: Department of National Defence seeks the services on Senior Technician. It is a 2-year contract with options for 2 additional 1-year extensions.

full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** cb-6769-95311030
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-239050/A
**Publication Date:** 2023-06-27
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-27T14:00:00

## Request for Proposal

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Senior Technician under Stream 5.2, Technical, Engineering and Maintenance Service, for a period of two (2) years, with options to extend for up to two (2) one-year periods. The tender is open to pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solutions Professional Service (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) number E60ZT-18TSPS.

## Key Requirements

*	Location: National Capital Region (NCR)
*	Specific Location: 720 Bluenose Private, Ottawa, Ontario, K1V 7M9
*	Service Provider Security Clearance: Secret
*	Contract Duration: Two (2) years, with options to extend
*	Contract Award: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

## Eligible Bidders

This tender is open to the following pre-qualified suppliers under the TSPS SA:
•	U9468269 Canada Corp.
•	Access Corporate Technologies Inc.
•	... 

## Additional Information

Security Requirements:
*	Supplier Security Clearance: Secret
*	Security Level: None
*	Personnel and Organization Security Screening: Refer to the Industrial Security Program (ISP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada

Bidders’ Inquiries:
*	Contact: Jennifer Ouellet
*	Email: jennifer.ouellet2@forces.gc.ca
*	Tel: (343) 598-1547

## Method of Supply

The TSPS Method of Supply is the result of a formal competitive process, providing an on-going opportunity for suppliers to become pre-qualified for future bidding opportunities.

For more information on the TSPS Method of Supply and how to become pre-qualified, contact Public Works and Government Services Canada (TPSGC).

## How to Obtain the RFP Documents

RFP documents will be emailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the pre-qualified suppliers invited to bid on this requirement. Bidders are advised that the RFP documents are not available on the Canadabuys.Canada.ca website.
